title: Hexdrinker/Maw bugged
body: I don't know if anyone else has noticed this, but sometimes champs hex/maw get popped even when no magic damage is done. I was playing riven fighting a yi and his maw popped out of nowhere even tho I had no AP damage from anything whatsoever.

replies.body: No Thunderlord's or anything? There's normally some small amount of unaccounted for magic damage that will trigger this.
P sure it was just thunderlords, sorry to bother lol

I don't remember how fast I bursted yi, I did have thunderlords but I don't think I procd it that late. It says magic damage that reduces you below 30% hp, and my thunderlords did around 150 damage or something. I'll try to watch in later games for this, but maybe you're right.
Did you have any items that might deal magic damage?
